CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starlight Soundwave relative to Terra Tempo Festival?
SRP.A: Starlight Soundwave is {below} Terra Tempo Festival in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Echo Bloom Festival relative to Starlight Soundwave?
SRP.A: Echo Bloom Festival is {above} Starlight Soundwave in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Terra Tempo Festival relative to Echo Bloom Festival?
SRP.A: Terra Tempo Festival is {above} Echo Bloom Festival in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total music festival attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Terra Tempo Festival}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total music festival attendance?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Echo Bloom Festival}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starlight Soundwave's minimum Music Festival Attendance in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starlight Soundwave's minimum Music Festival Attendance is in {2023}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starlight Soundwave's maximum Music Festival Attendance in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starlight Soundwave's maximum Music Festival Attendance is in {2012}.

NC.Q: Between 2016 and 2019, did the total Music Festival Attendance experience a larger or smaller change than between 2017 and 2020?
NC.A: The change in total music festival attendance between 2016 and 2019 was {larger} than between 2017 and 2020.

NC.Q: Between 2013 and 2017, did the total Music Festival Attendance experience a larger or smaller change than between 2017 and 2020?
NC.A: The change in total music festival attendance between 2013 and 2017 was {smaller} than between 2017 and 2020.

NC.Q: Between 2015 and 2019, did the total Music Festival Attendance experience a larger or smaller change than between 2015 and 2016?
NC.A: The change in total music festival attendance between 2015 and 2019 was {smaller} than between 2015 and 2016.

NC.Q: Was the total Music Festival Attendance in 2018 higher or lower than in 2022?
NC.A: The total music festival attendance in 2018 was {lower} than in 2022.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Terra Tempo Festival} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Azure Sky Symphony and Echo Bloom Festival first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Azure Sky Symphony and Echo Bloom Festival did not exchange leading positions.
